attributes.action: Begin mass vaccination of teaching and school staff ASAP
attributes.additional_details:
To enable our first class education system to continue safely 
To enable parents of children under 14 to work
To protect mental health if our young people 
To protect educators and their families
To protect out NHS by enabling parents to work and reducing those needing hospitalisation after contact with infected children daily
attributes.background: Vaccinate school staff against covid 19 urgently
